LanguageData.Yokai_Dragon_Redra.label: Redra
LanguageData.Yokai_Dragon_Redra.description: Smart, brave, and proud, the red dragons, Redra, do not mind the existence of others. They can be encountered in hot biomes, such as the Savannah or Desert.
LanguageData.Yokai_Dragon_Redra.tools.0.label: FrontLeftLeg

LanguageData.Yokai_Dragon_Redra.tools.2.label: Fang
